ygData.subject: I need your help!
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Magic Friends, Pip Holmes, the UK best loved entertainer and poet is secretly threatening retirement from magic following a horrific experience at Reading
ygData.messageBody:
Hi Magic Friends,

Pip Holmes, the UK best loved entertainer and poet is secretly
threatening retirement from magic following a horrific experience at
Reading Rock Festival. Read about it here.

http://www.geocities.com/pipholmes

That's why he needs your support! Join his new yahoogroup..a group
dedicated to the man, the mystery that is Pip Holmes. Featuring
regular updates on his website. Never before released poetry, magic
you can do, and personal messages from the man himself! Come show
your support! Lets get Pip back on stage!!

Join here:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/pipholmes


regards,

Roger
